message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $11000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
